origins.name: Anima Squad
origins.desc:
At each tier, pick a weapon that a random Anima Squad champion fires periodically during combat. Anima Squad champions gain Armor, Magic Resist, and Damage Amp.

Weapons scale with Anima Squad star level and stage.

origins.name: BoomBots
origins.desc: BoomBots fire a missile every 400 damage dealt at a nearby enemy that deals magic damage. 8% of damage taken contributes to damage dealt.

origins.name: Cyberboss
origins.desc: Your strongest Cyberboss upgrades to its final form and gains Health, Ability Power, and its ability hits more enemies.

origins.name: Divinicorp
origins.desc:
Divinicorp champions grant unique stats to your team, increased for each Divinicorp in play.

Divinicorp champions gain double.

Morgana - +9% AP
Rhaast - +6 AR/MR
Senna - +8% AD
Gragas - +50 Health
Vex - +7% CSC
Renekton - +5% AS
Emblem - +3% Omnivamp

origins.name: Exotech
origins.desc: Gain unique items that can only be equipped by Exotech champions. They gain Health and Attack Speed for each item equipped.

origins.name: Nitro
origins.desc:
Every round, Nitro champions grant Chrome to R-080T, based on their star level. Each Chrome grants 12 Health and 1 Ability Power.

At 200 Chrome, it upgrades to T-43X!

Chrome per star: 2/3/7/25

origins.name: Golden Ox
origins.desc:
Golden Ox gain Damage Amp and have a chance to drop gold on kill.

If you spend 8 gold on rerolls or XP in a single turn, permanently increase their Damage Amp and the gold required for the next bonus. Rerolls count double towards gold spent.
(Golden Ox must have fought last round)

origins.name: Syndicate
origins.desc:
Get a Kingpin hat that uniquely upgrades a Syndicate champion's ability.

Syndicate champions gain Health and Damage Amp.

origins.name: Street Demon
origins.desc:
Allies in painted hexes gain Health, Ability Power, and Attack Damage. Some hexes are Signature hexes and grant 50% more.

Street Demons double all bonuses.

origins.name: Cypher
origins.desc:
Gain Intel by losing combat, increased for loss streaks. Gain a small amount for killing enemies.

You may trade your Intel for loot one time on round
3-3, 3-7, 4-3, 4-7, or 5-5.
After trading Intel, Cypher champions gain Attack Damage and Ability Power.

classes.name: Bastion
classes.desc:
Your team gains 10 Armor and Magic Resist. Bastions gain more.

For the first 10 seconds of combat, Bastions increase their bonus by 100%.

classes.name: Bruiser
classes.desc: Your team gains 100 Health. Bruisers gain more.

classes.name: Strategist
classes.desc: Combat Start: Allies in the back 2 rows gain Damage Amp. Allies in the front 2 rows gain Durability. Strategists get triple.

classes.name: Executioner
classes.desc:
Executioner Abilities can critically strike. They also gain bonus Critical Strike Chance and Critical Strike Damage.

If the target's Health is below 20%, the bonus Critical Strike Damage is doubled.

classes.name: Marksman
classes.desc: Marksmen gain Attack Damage. After 8 seconds of combat, they increase their bonus by 100%.

classes.name: Slayer
classes.desc: Slayers gain Attack Damage and Omnivamp. Overhealing heals the lowest percent Health Slayer for 50% of the excess amount.

classes.name: A.M.P.
classes.desc: A.M.P. champions upgrade their abilities in unique ways with Amp. They also gain Health.

classes.name: Rapidfire
classes.desc: Your team gains 10% Attack Speed. Rapidfire champions gain more on each attack, stacking up to 10 times.

classes.name: Techie
classes.desc:
Techies gain Ability Power.

Enemies hit by their abilities deal 10% less damage for 3 seconds.

classes.name: Dynamo
classes.desc: Every 3 seconds, your team gains Mana. Dynamos gain 100% more.

classes.name: Vanguard
classes.desc:
Vanguards gain 12% Durability while Shielded.

Combat start and 50% Health: Gain a max Health Shield for 10 seconds.
